meta.reasoning: Task complete. Fixed the intermediate image state issue by: 1) Replacing .sheet(isPresented: $showingGuestDetail) with .sheet(item: $selectedGuestId), 2) Removing the unnecessary showingGuestDetail state variable, 3) Creating UUID+Identifiable extension to enable item-based sheet presentation, 4) Simplified the action closure to only set selectedGuestId. The sheet now waits for the content to be ready before appearing, eliminating the blank/placeholder state.
